morningBrief.headline: Winter in Full Force
morningBrief.body: 110 of 113 trails are open with 32 groomed. Snow & Wind with a high of 30째F. 4 new trails are now available. Nice little expansion. Watch for crowds at Dipper, which saw 12-minute waits yesterday.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Bear Crawl - perfect for intermediate skiers
Fresh corduroy on Coyote Crossing - perfect for intermediate skiers
Fresh corduroy on Challenger - challenging for advanced skiers

morningBrief.headline: Rain at Base, Snow Up Top
morningBrief.body: 99 trails open, 45 groomed. Rain/Snow, high of 39째. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Lift lines were mellow yesterday. Expect a similar vibe today.

morningBrief.headline: Stormy Conditions
morningBrief.body: 110 of 113 trails are open with 41 groomed. Snow & Wind with a high of 35째F. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Lift lines were mellow yesterday. Expect a similar vibe today.

morningBrief.headline: The Wait Continues
morningBrief.body: The mountain is still prepping for the season. Weather today: Mostly Clear.

today.description: Cloudy with sunny periods and isolated flurries.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Sea to Sky Railway - perfect for intermediate skiers
Fresh corduroy on Stoker - perfect for intermediate skiers

morningBrief.headline: Unlimited Visibility
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. Watch for crowds at 7th Heaven Express, which saw 13-minute waits yesterday. Clear skies and 32째 means stunning views and firm snow. Layer up.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Duck Soup - all skill levels
Fresh corduroy on Spillway - all skill levels
Fresh corduroy on Yodeler - all skill levels

morningBrief.headline: Stormy Conditions
morningBrief.body: 116/123 trails spinning, 62 freshly groomed. Snow Wind. 6 runs freshly groomed, mostly in Lower Mountain and Upper Mountain. Winter flexing today: snow and wind in the forecast. Dress for it.

morningBrief.headline: Big Expansion Today
morningBrief.body: 177/301 trails spinning, 83 freshly groomed. Snow. Big expansion: 19 new trails opened up. More room to roam. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: 10" of Fresh Overnight
morningBrief.body: 10" dumped overnight. The stashes are loaded and the groomers are buried. Blustery conditions with snow. Upper lifts may have holds.

morningBrief.headline: A Proper Refresh
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 4" boost overnight. Conditions are improved. Blustery conditions with snow. Upper lifts may have holds.

morningBrief.headline: The Mountain Got a Touch-Up
morningBrief.body: 1" of fresh snow settled in overnight. Not a powder day, but an upgrade. 1 new trail opened today. Snow showers in the forecast with a few inches expected. Conditions should improve.

morningBrief.headline: Stormy Conditions
morningBrief.body: 113 trails open, 54 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. Storm mode engaged. Expect snow and wind, especially at higher elevations.

morningBrief.headline: Fewer Crowds, More Turns
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 7" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore.

morningBrief.headline: 1" Freshened Things Up
morningBrief.body: Overnight dusting of 1" means the hardpack got a makeover. Nearly full mountain access with 64 of 64 trails spinning. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: Active Weather Today
morningBrief.body: 145 trails open, 57 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: Winter in Full Force
morningBrief.body: 132 trails open, 78 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. Storm mode engaged. Expect snow and wind, especially at higher elevations.

morningBrief.headline: More Snow Coming
morningBrief.body: 85 trails open, 69 groomed. Snow, temperatures TBD. Nearly full mountain access with 85 of 85 trails spinning. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: Storm on the Horizon
morningBrief.body: 27/96 trails spinning, 24 freshly groomed. Clear. 1 new trail opened today. Storm cycle alert! 6" on the way. Conditions are about to level up.

morningBrief.headline: Blustery and Snowy
morningBrief.body: 176/222 trails spinning, 92 freshly groomed. Snow Wind. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.
